name: Rich Knight
text: Great game room, great food (pizza is the best I‚Äôve had), great friendly employees, I also really like the gamer green where you get points to get great prizes from the gamer green app.

name: patricia perez
text: Tuesday night dinner buffet, all you can eat $8.49, YES PLEASE!!!!!

name: Christina Ross
text: Terrible service from the gal at the register. She was annoyed by simple questions. Most of the games took the tokens and didn't work or were out of order. Pizza had actual puddles of grease making it mushy. I was completely unimpressed. ‚Ä¶More

name: Tree
text: I had a great experience around table. The building itself was well renovated oh, I really enjoyed the theme. Definitely feels large party oriented with huge booths and banquet rooms. Great place to take kids for birthday parties I'm sure. ‚Ä¶More

name: Ben Janes
text: Lots of great beers on tap. Beer and wine only for the cocktail fans your going to have to stay away. Great happy hour pricing and very comfortable seating. The bar has a great feel with lots of high quality HD Tv's. The sliders were really ‚Ä¶More

name: Jaci McKim
text: We hadn't had Round Table pizza since we moved to Oregon from Yakima 15 years ago, so this was a real treat, even if we did have to drive 75 miles to get there!  Alex (our server) made sure we had everything we needed to take us back in ‚Ä¶More

name: John Dernoncourt
text: For those of you who might have been to Round Table before, this is a familiar yet different experience. Imagine a good pizza place combined with a sports bar and you'll have a good understanding of this place. Great pizza, daily specials ‚Ä¶More

name: D. Gray
text: Beautiful facility with great amenities! Unfortunately, there are a lot of restaurants in Corvallis, including a number of pizza restaurants. Their pizza is some of the best in the area, and with a great selection of beers on tap, the big ‚Ä¶More

name: Jon Stratton
text: Very clean, modern place. Friendly staff, great food. Reasonable prices, good location. Small arcade, several TVs around the place but not too noisy when we were there. Overall, I think we'll go again.

name: Veevee S
text: I ordered our usual pizza online , picked up pizza and brought it home.  It was the wrong pizza and no one could eat it!  Normally, I would call to replace it but I ended up just making dinner.  I took the pizza back after a few days and ‚Ä¶More

name: James Parsons
text: The staff at 1024 on 9th street are amazing.. James out in front made a mistake and owned it.. He fixed the issue we had right away and made things right.. AMAZING !!! Thank you so much James .. you Rock!!! Continue the awesome work!! Will definitely be back!

name: Tom Meyer
text:
Great salad deal!
Comfortable and friendly atmosphere!
Despite it being a chain, the place is uniquely and truly a pleasure to visit.

name: Jason Anderson
text: So, I made an online order to be picked up at a certain time. However, due to it being their customer appreciation day, their kitchen was a bit behind. The gentlemen that helped me was sincere, and being that I have worked at a pizza place ‚Ä¶More

name: Guera Garcia
text: Seriously disappointed they have amazing pizza, but customer service sucked! I had 4 games eat our tokens and when I complained they just laughed and said ‚Äúyeah, that happens.‚Äù ‚Ä¶More

name: Victoria Hinthorn
text: First let me say that the employee was very nice and they were under staffed. HOWEVER we were the only ones in there and our food (4 items) came out all at separate times. Took almost 45min to get all of our food. It was cold. The sour cream expired sp we didn't get that with our order. It could be better

name: Ryan Peterson
text: I have eaten here twice since it opened, once for a dine in and once for a delivery.    Both times the service has been great.  I think a lot of the reviews so far have unrealistic expectations for a brand new restaurant or have some other ‚Ä¶More

name: Tyson King
text:
First impressions either win or kill your business.  10:00pm Saturday night.

Walked in, not a single acknowledgment from anyone. Stood at the ordering ‚Ä¶More

name: Linda Nowell
text: Much better experience than the first time here. The buffet pizzas kept coming out of the kitchen hot and fresh.  The Ceasar dressing is good and not common in a salad bar. They have the "every kind of soda" machine here so I can customise my drink. Good customer service.

name: Paul Skarda
text: Great first visit! My son enjoyed the arcade and the pizza was excellent! The staff was friendly and helpful. Definately going again soon!

name: abbyboo101 3
text: Great food. Great lunch buffet, pizza and onion rings. My husband had a chicken sandwich and loved it. Can't wait to try more stuff there.

name: SunnyB
text: Great pizza!!  So excited for a Round Table pizza.   Best pizza ever!!!   Give this new place a chance without so much criticism.  New restaurants always have kinks that need to be worked out in the beginning.  So give them a try and help them work out their kinks!!

name: Mark Roberts
text: Having come from California, I was excited to see a Round table opening in Corvallis. I took a few friends to check it out one afternoon and it was a big disappointment. ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Whitney
text: Brand new restaurant on 9th St at old Ruby Tuesday's location.   Good sports screens, good pizza, salad bar & a great variety of other menu items.   Needs to have a grand opening.

name: Alasha Torres
text: Very nice place. We had a birthday party and would go there again

name: Kevin Mcpherron
text: I love round taxable. Try the garlic twists

name: Melissa Miller
text: It was fine. The people working there were nice enough. But it is definitely still new and working out the kinks. Standard chain restaurant fare.

name: Scott Summers
text: Great pizza, great atmosphere, lots of televisions playing all the shows you want to see. Wombo Combo is too good and they have the 'customize your Pepsi' machines with hundreds of flavor combos on tap!

name: American by Hand
text: Best round table pizza Ive ever had and the location is super clean. Bar is legit and they have sporting events on the mounted TV's just like a big sports bar

name: Inha Lation
text: This place has the family game room, sports bar, pizza buffet. On the other hand the pizza is so lame. All I can say is that's what a shoe sole taste like. Crust is a Zero! Meat toppings were scarce and the sauce yuk! This does not resemble any Round Table I ever had.. Good Luck!

name: Melanie Kay
text: Pizza was great. Salad bar was a bit spartan.

name: Robert Zuniga
text: Was not want I remember, small salad bar. However this Round Table Pizza actually has an adult bar with alcohol for adults. next time I come back I won't bring the kids.

name: Tisa Miller
text: Service a little slow considering only 3 people in the restaurant but food is great

name: Tom Dye
text: Just another big box national franchise taking the profit out of the community. During the build out local contractors left out of the mix. Sad. Worst pizza in Corvallis to boost. Ingredients all processed else where and shipped in.Pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Paulette Dunivin
text: Love how everything is set up and the staff are friendly and helpful one of the works James made us feel welcomed

name: jeff reeves
text: Confusing set up, you seat your self and order at a counter but there is no signage that explains this. Good wasn't that great.  I would order dominos or pizza now before going back.

name: Heather Osieczanek
text: The all you can eat Pizza and Salad Bar is well worth the money!!! Many pizza choices!! It's the only time I go, I mean who doesn't want all you can eat Pizza??

name: Isaac Deanda
text: Atmosphere and front desk lady

name: Jenelle Pinkston
text: So impressive! Great place to watch sports. We watched the Superbowl there

name: Mair Chick
text: I love coming here for Tuesday Buffet Night.  There is no better deal in town, no better value for the money, and delicious pizza and salad.

name: Karen Ambrose
text: Great experience... great staff as always... great food

name: Dale Larsen
text:
Good food and reasonable price
Friendly staff

text: First I want to say that there's a ton of good things about this Round Table Pizza. It looks fantastic, and the staff I talked to were all very friendly and apologetic for the problems I experienced. The food was delicious, easily one of ‚Ä¶More

text: Good buffet for pizza with an average selection salad bar.

name: amanda treichler
text: The food was decent but many of the games didn't work and the staff was super unhelpful. Either sitting around texting or watching TV .

name: Harley Blaire
text: I hosted an event at my place tonight and we ordered from here. Round table accepted my payment and the pizza never came... I was called and told there was an issue instead my hungry guests waited for almost 2 hours and I eventually ordered Papa's pizza and they actually provided a product.

name: Danielle Belshee
text: Good pizza and friendly stay. Nice selection of micro brews available.

name: Damian Gaily
text: Horrible service I came in sat at the bar for 15 mins. Then went to bathroom came out sat for about 10 more mins. Not one of the 4 employees came greated or asked me anything instead were just joking and talking amongst each other. So I just left!

name: Dave Muckey
text:
Great experience! We'll be back soon.
Thanks.

text: Great time spent with my granddaughter

name: April Lee
text: Our time here was ok the food was good, the main downfall was that most of the time there was not more than one person out front. The guy behind the bar had to let customers know that they could order.

text:
I have been to the new Round Table twice now. So far, pizza is just okay and I really don't like the ambience there.
I grew up with Round Table, in Calif.
Not too crazy about this particular location.

text:
More like a sports bar that has pizza. Extremely loud, no comfortable seating. Small family area and large deserted bar area.
NOT the great round table pizza we remembered. We left before eating because it was loud, cold and uncomfortable.
